function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of COVtech for pandemic management","Impact":"Inherent risks of technology implementation for pandemic management","Mitigation":"Monitoring and regulating the use of COVtech, ensuring data privacy and security, and educating the public about potential risks","Technologies":"COVtech, digital thermal-gantries, contact-tracing apps, drones","People":"General public, civil society groups, foreign workers","Owner":"Government, civil society groups"},{"Description":"Historical context and legacy of technologies","Impact":"Inherited and reworked technologies may pose new risks or challenges","Mitigation":"In-depth analysis and review of historical context, careful adaptation of technologies, and community engagement in decision-making","Technologies":"Historical technologies of governmentality, post-Apartheid public health interventions","People":"General public, civil society activists","Owner":"Researchers, government, civil society groups"},{"Description":"Community involvement in pandemic management","Impact":"Diverse approaches and technologies from civil society may pose coordination challenges","Mitigation":"Collaboration and coordination mechanisms, resource sharing, and information exchange","Technologies":"Community action networks, subaltern technologies","People":"General public, civil society groups, foreign workers","Owner":"Civil society groups, government"}]}
